name: cmintey-wishlist
tagline: A simple wish list manager for sharing gift ideas
description: wishlist is a self-hosted wish list manager where users can track items they want, share lists with friends or family, and avoid duplicate gifts. It focuses on simplicity, privacy, and easy sharing through a web-based interface.

features.title: Item Management
features.description: Add items with names, descriptions, links, and prices to organize your wishes

features.title: List Sharing
features.description: Share wish lists with family and friends via unique URLs without requiring accounts

features.title: Claim Tracking
features.description: Mark items as claimed to prevent duplicate purchases while keeping surprises intact

features.title: Multiple Lists
features.description: Create separate lists for different occasions like birthdays, holidays, or general wants

features.title: Priority Levels
features.description: Assign priority to items so others know what matters most to you

features.title: Image Support
features.description: Attach images to items for visual reference and easier identification

features.title: Price Tracking
features.description: Record item prices to help gift-givers stay within budget

features.title: User Accounts
features.description: Create accounts for multiple family members on a single instance
